Title: The True Seeing Is Within
Writer: Moira Walley-Beckett (created by), Lucy Maud Montgomery (based on "Anne of Green Gables"), Kathryn Borel
Actors: Amybeth McNulty, Geraldine James, R.H. Thomson, Taras Lavren
Plot: An adventure away with the Barrys teaches Anne to trust her instincts. Marilla begins to suspect that her boarders aren't as innocent as they seem.
